name: Smash Room
description:
Welcome to the ultimate stress-busting experience! Smash Room allows you to smash, break, and destroy objects to your heart's content. With intuitive controls and a wide selection of tools at your disposal, you can indulge in some healthy destruction and release your inner frustration like never before. Enjoy all of the smashing fun without any of the cleanup of real-life destruction.

Smash Room offers a variety of game play modes to suit your mood. In Free Play mode, you can spawn a variety of objects and go to town on them with a crowbar, sledgehammer, or baseball bat. Smash glass, crush plates, and demolish furniture to your heart's content!

For a more structured experience, try out our challenges. These challenges will test your smashing skills in unique ways, such as the Archery challenge where you can smash targets with a bow and arrow. The challenges are designed to be both entertaining and engaging, encouraging you to keep coming back to improve your skills and smash your way to victory!

Smash Room is easy to use and accessible to people who want that more immersive VR experience. Our intuitive controls allow you to easily pick up and use a variety of tools, and our variety of objects to smash keep the experience fresh and exciting. Best of all, you can enjoy all of the smashing fun without any of the cleanup or safety concerns of real-life destruction.
